title: iter a dataloader and then finish, get this error
body_html:
when i iter a dataloader, the code like this
self.iters[name] = iter(dataloader)
and then just finish the python program
sys.exit()
then i get the error

Exception ignored in: <bound method _DataLoaderIter.del of <torch.utils.data.dataloader._DataLoaderIter object at 0x7fe763ece898>>
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/work/chenchaoxing/tools/python/python36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 349, in del
File "/home/work/chenchaoxing/tools/python/python36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 328, in _shutdown_workers
File "/home/work/chenchaoxing/tools/python/python36/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/queues.py", line 337, in get
AttributeError: Can't get attribute '_rebuild_tensor_v2' on None
Exception ignored in: <bound method _DataLoaderIter.del of <torch.utils.data.dataloader._DataLoaderIter object at 0x7fe75885cef0>>
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/work/chenchaoxing/tools/python/python36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 349, in del
File "/home/work/chenchaoxing/tools/python/python36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 328, in _shutdown_workers
File "/home/work/chenchaoxing/tools/python/python36/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/queues.py", line 337, in get
AttributeError: Can't get attribute '_rebuild_tensor_v2' on None

body:
when i iter a dataloader,  the code like this
`
self.iters[name] = iter(dataloader)
`
and then just finish the python program
`sys.exit()`
then i get the error

Exception ignored in: <bound method _DataLoaderIter.__del__ of <torch.utils.data.dataloader._DataLoaderIter object at 0x7fe763ece898>>
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/work/chenchaoxing/tools/python/python36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 349, in __del__
  File "/home/work/chenchaoxing/tools/python/python36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 328, in _shutdown_workers
  File "/home/work/chenchaoxing/tools/python/python36/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/queues.py", line 337, in get
AttributeError: Can't get attribute '_rebuild_tensor_v2' on None
Exception ignored in: <bound method _DataLoaderIter.__del__ of <torch.utils.data.dataloader._DataLoaderIter object at 0x7fe75885cef0>>
Traceback (most recent call last):
